data.title: Dog Rehoming, Rescue & Adoption Shelter Leeds
data.meta_description: Contact details and opening hours for the Dogs Trust Rehoming Centre in Leeds. Come and say hello!
data.text:
We can care for up to 80 dogs in our 64 kennels, with a vet suite, training barn, large field for exercise and dedicated puppy blocks.

In 2023 we helped 653 dogs find loving homes!

Support our centre

We rely on your kind support to continue our vital work, please donate today.

If you are interested in donating In Memory, have questions about our Canine Care Card service, leaving a Legacy or if you would like to book a guest speaker for your Community Group, then please get in touch with your local Leeds Supporter Relations Officer or call on 011 3281 4937.

Adoption process
